textAfterTable: Player News | 07/01/2015 2:01 PM News Ajinca signed a four-year, $20 million deal to remain with the Pelicans on Wednesday, ESPN's Marc Stein reports. rotowire.com New Orleans center Alexis Ajinca scored a career-high 24 points during Friday's win over the Heat. | 02/27/2015 10:36 PM News New Orleans center Alexis Ajinca scored a career-high 24 points during Friday's win over the Heat. sportsnetwork.com Impact He did so off the bench in 22 minutes of action, and 9-of-19 from the field and 6-of-8 from the line. Ajinca also managed eight rebounds, three blocks, and one turnover. He can still be left on the wire. New Orleans center Alexis Ajinca certainly benefited from the absence of Anthony Davis with 16 points and nine rebounds on Monday versus the Raptors. | 02/23/2015 10:30 PM News New Orleans center Alexis Ajinca certainly benefited from the absence of Anthony Davis with 16 points and nine rebounds on Monday versus the Raptors. sportsnetwork.com Impact It has been nearly a month since Ajinca scored at least 16 points. He is an interesting candidate to add if Davis misses more
